name: faster-video
title: Faster Video
description: Allows manipulation of the playback rate of HTML5 videos
author: ispedals

preferences.name: speeds
preferences.title: Video Speeds
preferences.description: Sets which video speeds to choose from (comma-separated)

preferences.name: modifiers
preferences.title: Video Speed Modifiers
preferences.description: Sets by which units one can change the video speed (comma-separated)
